intent_atoms.description: Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and must not overlap payloads.
Implement real‑world asset licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG‑H to replace synthetic payloads in regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing
functional_units.description: Parses and validates sample encryption placeholder data for senc/saio/saiz boxes, providing regression fixtures and coverage.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Validation
functional_units.description: Ensures child boxes stay within parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads, with support for CLI and UI surfaces.
